{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3578319,"name":"Arnaud Girard","username":"Arnaud_Girard","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/db5fbb/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-04-02T20:00:08.930Z","cooked":"

I am trying to flash our 2025.0 limelight 4 to 2025.1 but I am unable to find the configuration button on the limelight. And as such am unable to find the driver in balena etcher. The docs say that I need to press on the config button to flash it :

“1. Power off your Limelight
2. Download the latest USB drivers/RPIboot, Limelight OS image, and Balena Flash tool
3. Hold the config button while connecting a USB-C cable from your laptop to your Limelight
4. Run “rpiboot-CM4-CM5 - Mass Storage Gadget” from the Windows start menu”

I am holding the button and then plugging the usb-c cable to my laptop and it still doesn’t do anything. Do I need to plug my limelight using the weidmuller connector?
